titleStmt.title: Judas excommunicated, or A vindication of the communion of saints: being a brief examination and clear refutation of Mr Peter Lightfoots arguments for proof of Judas his receiving the sacrament of the Lords Supper, (which, could he prove, makes nothing at all for a mixt Communion.) / By Joseph Heming, a servant to all men in the Gospel of Jesus Christ.
titleStmt.author: Heming, Joseph.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for Giles Calvert at the black Spread-Eagle neer the West end of Pauls,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the British Library.
